support.description: Content is actively maintained. Please report errors and inconsistencies

author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.

segments.pli: Rūpabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, na ca bhogabalena—
segments.en: A female who has the power of attractiveness but not the power of wealth

segments.pli: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo rūpabalena ca samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca—
segments.en: But when she has the power of attractiveness and the power of wealth

segments.pli: Rūpabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca, na ca ñātibalena—
segments.en: A female who has the powers of attractiveness and wealth, but not the power of relatives

segments.pli: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo rūpabalena ca samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ñātibalena ca—
segments.en: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives

segments.pli: Rūpabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ñātibalena ca, na ca puttabalena—
segments.en: A female who has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives, but not the power of children

segments.pli: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo rūpabalena ca samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ñātibalena ca, puttabalena ca—
segments.en: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children

segments.pli: Rūpabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ñātibalena ca, puttabalena ca, na ca sīlabalena—
segments.en: A female who has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children, but not the power of ethical behavior

segments.pli: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo rūpabalena ca samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ñātibalena ca, puttabalena ca, sīlabalena ca—
segments.en: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca mātugāmassa balānī”ti.
segments.en: These are the five powers of a female.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.…

suttaplex.blurb: A woman may be complete with five powers.
